name: agentc
description: Zero cognitive load from empty directory to shipped product. Self-bootstrapping /next → /do → /done loop. Just type /next and the system guides you through discovery, design, and implementation.

commands.name: add-north-star
commands.description: Create north star with Socratic questioning

commands.name: clean-gone
commands.description: Remove stale local branches tracking deleted remotes

commands.name: commit-push-pr
commands.description: Full workflow: commit, push, create PR

commands.name: do
commands.description: Execute current task with TDD discipline

commands.name: hookify
commands.description: Create hooks to prevent unwanted behaviors

commands.name: lock-and-deploy
commands.description: Lock and deploy plugin to marketplace

commands.name: review-pr
commands.description: Comprehensive PR review with specialized agents

commands.name: skill
commands.description: Create a new skill from recurring patterns

commands.name: skip
commands.description: Skip to queued task if blocked

commands.name: status
commands.description: Show all north stars and progress
